songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Fat Joe (Lil Wayne)]
Ooooooowwwwwwww! (Ha ha, chyeah)
Scotty (chyeah)
Let's make it rain on these niggas (Joey Crack)

[Hook: Lil Wayne]
Yeah I'm in this bitch with the terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
Yeah I'm in this bitch with the terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain,(I make It rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain,(I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain(I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes

[Verse 1: Fat Joe]
Cr- cr- crack crack crack crack crack
You hear the Echo, man I seen the best go, you seen how that metal
I'm a hustla's hustla, a pusher's pusher
You a busta a custerma, I get you some cooka
Yea crack is a chemist, I pack a 11
I mack in a 7, I'll clap at your reverend
I see you in NY, I'll send you an invite
You gon' need you a pass, that's the code that we live by

[Hook: Lil Wayne]
Yeah I'm in this bitch with the terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
Yeah I'm in this bitch with the terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain,(I make It rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain,(I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain(I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes

[Bridge: Fat Joe & Trina]
Oww clap clap clap gotta make that ass clap gotta make that ass clap
Clap clap clap clap gotta make that ass clap gotta make that ass clap
Uh uh trina
Crack uh yuh crack yuh crack yuh

[Verse 2: Trina]
Make it rain thats my middle name pink diamond pinky ring
Say my name (Trina) say my name (Trina)
Bet shit won't be the same rahhh
I'm the hurricane wipin' fake bitches out
? just a mixtape wait until the albums out
You probably had doubts listenin' to them hataz
But thats my favorite restaurant so motherfuckaz waitaz
So give you a tip i'm a real boss player
Like that vampire chick; a rap bitch slayerr

[Hook: Trina & Lil Wayne]
Yeah im in this bitch with the terror
Got a purse full of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain [i make it rain]
Im in this bitch with the terror
Got a purse full of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain [yeah]
I make it rain on these niggas
(Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella)
I make it rain [i make it rain]
I make it rain on these niggas
Got a purse full of stacks better grab an umbrella
(Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella)
I make it rain
(I make it rain. make it rain on them hoes)
(I make it rain, i make it rain)
I make it rain on these niggas
(I make it rain, i make it rain. i make it rain on them hoes)
(I make it rain, i make it rain. i make it rain on them hoes)

[Hook: Lil Wayne]
Yeah I'm in this business of terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
I'm in this business of terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
Yeah
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain,(I make It rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain,(I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes I make it rain(I make it rain)
I make it rain on them hoes

[Verse 3: Fat Joe]
Oww mami's body is bangin' man she got it man she does it all
She gets it poppin' with no hands I'll make it pour
I'll make it rain on 'em I'll lay a game to 'em
I'm gassin' misses to tattoo my name on 'em
Gotta get that baby love, gotta get my paper up
Gotta suspect me, exactly test this crack and want a ring on us
And you know what it is, yeah it's them powder kids
And we know how to bizz, so we don't give a shit

[Hook: Lil Wayne]
Yeah I'm in this business of terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
I'm in this business of terror
Got a handful of stacks better grab an umbrella
I make it rain (I make it rain)
